name: BLACKSKY-MD Premium
description: Advanced Multilingual WhatsApp Bot - Premium 24/7 Edition

SESSION_ID.description: A unique session ID for your WhatsApp connection

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Your WhatsApp number with country code (e.g. 491556315347)

TZ.description: Timezone for scheduling and logs (e.g. Europe/Berlin, America/New_York)

LANGUAGE.description: Default language for bot responses (en = English, de = German)

ENABLE_HEALTH_CHECK.description: Enable health check endpoint to keep the app alive

ENABLE_SESSION_BACKUP.description: Enable automatic session backup to prevent session loss

BACKUP_INTERVAL.description: Interval in minutes between session backups

MAX_MEMORY_MB.description: Maximum memory allowed before auto-restart (in MB)

PM2_RESTART_CRON.description: Cron schedule for daily restart (default: 4:00 AM)

KEEP_ALIVE_URL.description: URL to ping to keep the app alive (your-app-name.herokuapp.com)

RECONNECT_INTERVAL.description: Interval in seconds between reconnection attempts

MAX_RECONNECT_RETRIES.description: Maximum number of reconnection attempts before giving up

NOTIFICATION_RETRY_INTERVAL.description: Interval in seconds between notification retry attempts

NODE_OPTIONS.description: Node.js options for better memory management

scripts.postdeploy: mkdir -p logs sessions sessions-backup tmp media

runtime-dyno-metadata.description: Access to metadata about the current dyno
